forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 30. North wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 45. North wind 8 to 13 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening deepens over Boston, a tranquil stillness envelops the city. The skies remain clear, illuminated only by the scattered glow of streetlights and the occasional beacon signaling the landscape’s more industrial edges. The temperature hovers near the chilly mark of 30 degrees, a reminder of winter's approach, with a crisp north wind weaving through the twilight, making the air feel brisk and invigorating. It’s a night that may invite one to wrap up warmly, perhaps donning a thick scarf or an oversized coat, so as to brave the outdoors comfortably.

Tomorrow promises a beautiful sunny day, a pleasing contrast to this evening's cool embrace. With expected highs reaching 45 degrees, it will be an ideal opportunity for a leisurely stroll through one of Boston's storied neighborhoods. Picture yourself wandering along the cobblestone paths, coffee in hand, surrounded by the warmth of the autumn sun. Dress layers for warmth beneath your coat, for the lingering breeze may still carry a bite. Casual observations of the seasonal beauty—a hint of foliage in the last remnants of fall—may lead to an impromptu chat with fellow Bostonians, as you marvel together at the wonder of simple moments shared under an inviting blue sky.
